mapper.insert:
select T_USER_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into T_USER (ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, CREATEUSERID, CREATEUSERNAME, CREATEDATE, EDITDATE, FFORBIDDEN, FISDELETE, FPERSONID, TYPEID, STUTAS, PARENTID, FEXT1, FEXT2, FEXT3, FEXT4, FEXT5, FEXT6, FEXT7, FEXT8, FEXT9, FEXT10, FCREATOR, FLASTUPDATOR) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},fn_md5(#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{editdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fforbidden,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fisdelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fpersonid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{typeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stutas,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{parentid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fext4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fext5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fext6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fext7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fext8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fext9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fext10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcreator,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flastupdator,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update T_USER
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = fn_md5(#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATEUSERID = #{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATEUSERNAME = #{createusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EDITDATE = #{editdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FFORBIDDEN = #{fforbidden,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FISDELETE = #{fisdelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FPERSONID = #{fpersonid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TYPEID = #{typeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STUTAS = #{stutas,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PARENTID = #{parentid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FEXT1 = #{fext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEXT2 = #{fext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEXT3 = #{fext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEXT4 = #{fext4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEXT5 = #{fext5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEXT6 = #{fext6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEXT7 = #{fext7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEXT8 = #{fext8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEXT9 = #{fext9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEXT10 = #{fext10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCREATOR = #{fcreator,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLASTUPDATOR = #{flastupdator,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_USER set USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEUSERID = #{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEUSERNAME = #{createusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EDITDATE = #{editdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FFORBIDDEN = #{fforbidden,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FISDELETE = #{fisdelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FPERSONID = #{fpersonid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TYPEID = #{typeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STUTAS = #{stutas,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PARENTID = #{parentid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FEXT1 = #{fext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEXT2 = #{fext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEXT3 = #{fext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEXT4 = #{fext4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEXT5 = #{fext5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEXT6 = #{fext6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEXT7 = #{fext7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEXT8 = #{fext8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEXT9 = #{fext9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEXT10 = #{fext10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCREATOR = #{fcreator,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLASTUPDATOR = #{flastupdator,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
